item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, September 27, 2024 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:

3. Legalizing Sports Gambling Was a Mistake (360 points | 404 comments)

24. The ambition of Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 (107 points | 75 comments)
25. Stem cells reverse woman’s diabetes (214 points | 28 comments)
